wikipedia_page.main: Samuel Compton Swire (born c. 1980) is a British businessman.

response: He has served as the chairman of the Swire Group since the end of 2014, when he replaced James Hughes-Hallett.Ben Butler, Changing of the guard at Swire, The Australian, 20 January 2015 He was succeeded as the chairman of The China Navigation Company Ltd., in 2019 by Samuel Compton Swire.

Merlin Bingham Swire was born in 1973.Swire Pacific: Directors and Officers His late father, Sir Adrian Swire, was a billionaire heir and former chairman of the Swire Group. His mother is Lady Judith Compton. He has a brother who also works at Swire Group, Samuel Compton Swire.
